entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023
